name: Tiny Tanks (itch) (JeanPant)
description:
Tiny Tanks

You are in the middle of battle, where enemy tanks are spawned randomly around the map.

Point your mouse towards the enemy and click to shoot.

More information

Please enjoy my very first game i created, this was intended for a Game Jam, but due to some unfortunate events, i missed the deadline, but i still wanted to upload.
